## cilium endpoint health

View endpoint health

### Synopsis


View endpoint health

```
cilium endpoint health <endpoint id>
```

### Examples

```
cilium endpoint health 5421
```

### Options

```
  -o, --output string   json| jsonpath='{}'
```

      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
